abstract.text: Uses a multidimensional lookup table to transform a 32-bit planar image.

uses the lookup table from the example code in the Discussion section for
. The source image contains three pixels, one is pure red, one is pure green, and one is pure blue. On return, the destination image contains three pixels with the values

abstract.text: A flag that disables vImage internal tiling routines.
Full linear interpolation.

An opaque pointer that represents a multidimensional lookup table.

A raw pointer for accessing and manipulating untyped data.
